name: Hippowdon
description: The Heavyweight Pokémon. It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters an outside battle, the weather immediately changes to a Sandstorm for 5 rounds. In the case of another Pokémon with a similar weather ability, the tie goes to the Pokémon with the highest DEX score.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.
